member.name: IAssocHandler.CreateInvoker
member.summary: Retrieves an object that enables the invocation of the associated handler on the current selection. The invoker includes the ability to verify whether the current selection is supported.
member.param: A pointer to an that represents the selected item or items on which to invoke the handler. Note that if you have only a single item, could be the better choice. See Remarks for more details.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an object. This object is used to invoke the menu item after ensuring that the selected items are supported by the associated handler.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAssocHandler.GetIconLocation
member.summary: Retrieves the location of the icon associated with the application.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string that contains the path to the application's icon.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the index of the icon within the resource named in ppszPath.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAssocHandler.GetName
member.summary: Retrieves the full path and file name of the executable file associated with the file type.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string that contains the full path of the file, including the file name.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAssocHandler.GetUIName
member.summary: Retrieves the display name of an application.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string that contains the display name of the application.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
